channel.title: How would i change the godsword wield animation?
channel.description:
like at the moment the guy holds the on his shoulder and i would like to change it to another one i have. what do i search and in wut client.java or what?
note: im new at this don't be so harsh k?

item.title: How would i change the godsword wield animation?
item.dc:creator: @_Tonypker13 *Tonypker13
item.description:
@_Tonypker13 wrote:

I first off suggest you use some better grammar.
Find the animation ID, and search it within the client class.

Read full topic
